title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
**Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter: Your Ultimate Roadside Rescue Companion**

Are you tired of being stranded on the side of the road with a dead battery? Look no further than the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, a powerful and portable solution to get your vehicle back on the road in no time.

**Unparalleled Power and Performance**

With a peak current of 4000A and a massive 27800mAh battery capacity, this jump starter can handle even the toughest engine starts. Whether you're driving a gas-powered vehicle or a diesel engine up to 10L, our jump starter has got you covered. And with 40 starts on a full charge, you can rely on it to get you out of a sticky situation time and time again.

**Advanced Safety Features and Intelligent Protection Systems**

Our jump starter comes equipped with advanced safety features, including short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection protection. This means you can trust our device to keep you and your vehicle safe while jump-starting.

**Convenient and Portable Design**

The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is designed to be compact and portable, making it easy to take with you on the go. With a rugged design and metal clamps, it's built to withstand the rigors of regular use. And with a built-in LED light featuring three modes - flashlight, SOS, and strobe - you'll never be left in the dark.

**Fast Charging and Multiple Ports**

Our jump starter features rapid charging technology, charging 75% faster than ordinary power banks. And with multiple USB ports, including a 5V/3A, 9V/2A, and 12V/1.5A port, you can charge your devices on the go. Plus, with a Type-C input/output port, you can charge your jump starter quickly and easily.

**What's Included**

* Portable Battery Starter
* Jumper Cables
* USB-C Cable
* Cigarette Lighter Converter
* Carry Case
* User Manual

**24-Hour Online Support**

Our dedicated team is available 24/7 to provide you with top-notch support and assistance. Whether you have questions or concerns, we're here to help.

Don't let a dead battery leave you stranded. Get your AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and drive with confidence.
